answers.answer: Be strong for him. He's a fighter and i know God will give u the strength to go this and have a healthy baby.

I delivered my daughter at 32 weeks because of eclampsia and help syndrome. It was bad and we had to fight but we're both alive and healthy. Her 11th birthday is next week :D. You and your baby will be ok, just fight and have patience.

question: In the hospital, hating this. I guess I have preeclampsia. I am 32 weeks and my fluid is low. I am so worried about my poor baby.  :( so far he's doing good but I feel terrible
title: 32 weeks & the hospital :(
